summary.span: 为所有活动设计器组件提供强制的基类。

span.span: Provides a mandatory base class for all activity designer components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 所有活动设计器组件都是从 派生的。All activity designer components derive from . 提供了一个简单设计器，使用户可以在设计模式下直观地设计活动。The provides a simple designer which lets the user visually design activities in the design mode. 为活动提供了一个简单机制，使它们可以参与在设计图面上呈现工作流的操作。 provides a simple mechanism for the activities so they can participate in rendering the workflow on the design surface. 使用户可以自定义与活动关联的布局和绘制。 lets the user customize layout and drawing associated with the activity. 使用户可以扩展与活动关联的元数据。 lets the user extend the metadata associated with the activity. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了自定义活动的 的完整实现。The following example shows a complete implementation of an for a custom activity. 该设计器有一个可切换的标志，该标志允许基类 控制绘制操作或使用 类的各种方法来绘制活动。The designer has a flag that can be toggled to allow the base class to control the painting or to utilize the various methods the class to draw the activity. span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 当正在执行拖放操作且指针进入设计器边界时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the drag-drop operation is in progress and the pointer enters the designer bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将鼠标拖到设计器中时，会引发 事件。The event is raised when the mouse is dragged into the designer. 下面描述与拖放操作相关的事件的引发方式以及引发时间。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 如果设计器是有效的放置目标，则会引发 事件并产生指定的拖放效果。If the designer is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 跟踪指针位置、键盘状态和鼠标注释状态的更改。Changes in the pointer position, keyboard state, and mouse comment state are tracked. - 如果用户将鼠标移出设计器边界，则会引发 事件。If the user moves out of the designer bounds, the event is raised. - 如果鼠标进入另一个设计器，则会引发该设计器的 。If the mouse enters another designer, the for that designer is raised. - 如果鼠标发生移动但停留在同一设计器中，则会引发 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the event is raised. - 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态发生了更改，则会引发 事件并根据事件 的 Action 属性值确定是继续拖动数据、放置数据还是取消操作。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the Action property of the event . 如果该值为 `DragAction.Continue`，则会引发 事件以继续操作，并引发 事件以产生新效果，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标上时，就能够为用户提供有关鼠标位置的最新反馈。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up to date feedback on the mouse position. 如果该值为 `DragAction.Drop`，则会向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以对源数据执行适当的操作；例如，如果是移动操作，则会显示数据的注释。If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, see comment the data if the operation was a move. 如果该值为 `DragAction.Cancel`，则会引发 事件。If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the event is raised. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDragLeave() cil managed
abstract member OnDragLeave : unit -> unit override this.OnDragLeave : unit -> unit

summary.span: 当正在执行拖放操作且指针移出设计器边界时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the drag-drop operation is in progress and the pointer leaves the designer bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户将指针拖出设计器或取消当前的拖放操作时，会引发 事件。The event is raised when the user drags the pointer out of the designer or the user cancels the current drag-and-drop operation. 下面描述与拖放操作相关的事件的引发方式以及引发时间。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 如果设计器是有效的放置目标，则会引发 事件并产生指定的拖放效果。If the designer is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 跟踪指针位置、键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改。Changes in the pointer position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果用户将鼠标移出设计器边界，则会引发 事件。If the user moves out of the designer bounds, the event is raised. - 如果鼠标进入另一个设计器，则会引发该设计器的 。If the mouse enters another designer, the for that designer is raised. - 如果鼠标发生移动但停留在同一设计器中，则会引发 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the event is raised. - 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态发生了更改，则会引发 事件并根据事件 的 Action 属性值确定是继续拖动数据、放置数据还是取消操作。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the Action property of the event . 如果该值为 `DragAction.Continue`，则会引发 事件以继续操作，并引发 事件以产生新效果，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标上时，就能够为用户提供有关鼠标位置的最新反馈。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up to date feedback on the mouse position. 如果该值为 `DragAction.Drop`，则会向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以对源数据执行适当的操作；例如，如果是移动操作，则会剪切数据。If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. 如果该值为 `DragAction.Cancel`，则会引发 事件。If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the event is raised. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面描述与拖放操作相关的事件的引发方式以及引发时间。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 如果设计器是有效的放置目标，则会引发 事件并产生指定的拖放效果。If the designer is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. - 跟踪指针位置、键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改。Changes in the pointer position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果用户将鼠标移出设计器边界，则会引发 事件。If the user moves out of the designer bounds, the event is raised. - 如果鼠标进入另一个设计器，则会引发该设计器的 。If the mouse enters another designer, the for that designer is raised. - 如果鼠标发生移动但停留在同一设计器中，则会引发 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the event is raised. - 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态发生了更改，则会引发 事件并根据事件 的 Action 属性值确定是继续拖动数据、放置数据还是取消操作。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the Action property of the event . 如果该值为 `DragAction.Continue`，则会引发 事件以继续操作，并引发 事件以产生新效果，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标上时，就能够为用户提供有关鼠标位置的最新反馈。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up to date feedback on the mouse position. 如果该值为 `DragAction.Drop`，则会向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以对源数据执行适当的操作；例如，如果是移动操作，则会剪切数据。If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. 如果该值为 `DragAction.Cancel`，则会引发 事件。If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the event is raised. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面描述与拖放操作相关的事件的引发方式以及引发时间。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 如果设计器是有效的放置目标，则会引发 事件并产生指定的拖放效果。If the designer is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. - 跟踪指针位置、键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改。Changes in the pointer position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果用户将鼠标移出设计器边界，则会引发 事件。If the user moves out of the designer bounds, the event is raised. - 如果鼠标进入另一个设计器，则会引发该设计器的 。If the mouse enters another designer, the for that designer is raised. - 如果鼠标发生移动但停留在同一设计器中，则会引发 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the event is raised. - 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态发生了更改，则会引发 事件并根据事件 的 Action 属性值确定是继续拖动数据、放置数据还是取消操作。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the Action property of the event . 如果该值为 `DragAction.Continue`，则会引发 事件以继续操作，并引发 事件以产生新效果，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标上时，就能够为用户提供有关鼠标位置的最新反馈。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up to date feedback on the mouse position. 如果该值为 `DragAction.Drop`，则会向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以对源数据执行适当的操作；例如，如果是移动操作，则会剪切数据。If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. 如果该值为 `DragAction.Cancel`，则会引发 事件。If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the event is raised. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面描述与拖放操作相关的事件的引发方式以及引发时间。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 如果设计器是有效的放置目标，则会引发 事件并产生指定的拖放效果。If the designer is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. - 跟踪指针位置、键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改。Changes in the pointer position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果用户将鼠标移出设计器边界，则会引发 事件。If the user moves out of the designer bounds, the event is raised. - 如果鼠标进入另一个设计器，则会引发该设计器的 。If the mouse enters another designer, the for that designer is raised. - 如果鼠标发生移动但停留在同一设计器中，则会引发 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the event is raised. - 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态发生了更改，则会引发 事件并根据事件 的 Action 属性值确定是继续拖动数据、放置数据还是取消操作。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the Action property of the event . 如果该值为 `DragAction.Continue`，则会引发 事件以继续操作，并引发 事件以产生新效果，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 枚举。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标上时，就能够为用户提供有关鼠标位置的最新反馈。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up to date feedback on the mouse position. 如果该值为 `DragAction.Drop`，则会向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以对源数据执行适当的操作；例如，如果是移动操作，则会剪切数据。If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. 如果该值为 `DragAction.Cancel`，则会引发 事件。If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the event is raised. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. 如果该值为 `DragAction.Cancel`，则会引发 事件。If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the event is raised. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 Verbs 方法可确定要显示在上下文菜单中的谓词。Use the Verbs method to determine the verbs to show on the Context Menu. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写 属性以插入 的自定义谓词操作。The following example demonstrates how to override the property to insert custom verb actions for a . `CreateActivityVerbs` 创建一个名为 的新 `"Add New Parallel Branch"`，并将它与名为 `OnAddParallelBranch` 的事件处理程序关联。The `CreateActivityVerbs` creates a new named `"Add New Parallel Branch"` and associates an event handler named `OnAddParallelBranch`. 在工作流设计器中单击该谓词时，即会调用该事件处理程序。When the verb is clicked in the workflow designer, the event handler is called. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#73](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#73)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#73](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#73)]
